title: Integrate TaskSpec loader
summary: Load structured TaskSpec definitions at the start of each orchestration run.
details: Ensure agent/orchestrator.py reads tasks from the repository so planning logic can replace the demo fallback.
acceptance_criteria: Orchestrator reads TaskSpec files from the repository tasks directory.
Failures to load tasks are surfaced with actionable error messages.

title: Retire example fallback flow
summary: Replace add_example_code with backlog-driven task execution.
details: Use the loaded TaskSpecs to select work, apply modifications, and avoid overwriting sample modules.
acceptance_criteria: Orchestrator no longer writes placeholder hello/buildinfo/test files.
Selected TaskSpec drives the code changes and documentation updates for the run.
